form.label: HOWTO LPAR: Generate stats and charts with Splunk Search Processing Language (SPL) for IBM Pseries Pools
form.description: This collection of request samples will help you generating your own reports, dashboards and alerts for Nmon Performance data using the native Search Processing Language

h2.a: CPU Usage Statistics for IBM PSeries Pools

panel.title: Optionally preset frameID and/or hostname and press Enter:
Time oriented and statistics oriented charts:

div.h2: Pool Max CPU Usage for last 24 hours with auto span custom definition: (no limits in number of series, don't generate OTHER field)
div.pre: eventtype=nmon:performance type=LPAR frameID=$frameID$ hostname=$hostname$ | eval Pool_usage=round((poolCPUs-PoolIdle),2) | timechart useother=f limit=0 `nmon_span` max(Pool_usage) AS Pool_usage by hostname

div.h2: Pool Max CPU Usage with Pool Number of CPUs for last 24 hours with auto span custom definition: (no limits in number of series, don't generate OTHER field)
div.pre: eventtype=nmon:performance type=LPAR frameID=$frameID$ hostname=$hostname$ | eval Pool_usage=round((poolCPUs-PoolIdle),2) | timechart useother=f limit=0 `nmon_span` max(Pool_usage) AS Pool_usage, max(poolCPUs) AS poolCPUs by hostname

div.h2: Pool Max CPU Percentage Usage for last 24 hours with auto span custom definition: (no limits in number of series, don't generate OTHER field)
div.pre: eventtype=nmon:performance type=LPAR frameID=$frameID$ hostname=$hostname$ | eval Pool_Pct_usage=round(((poolCPUs-PoolIdle)/poolCPUs*100),2) | timechart useother=f limit=0 `nmon_span` max(Pool_Pct_usage) AS Pool_Pct_usage by hostname

div.h2: Search for partitions reporting Default Pools and valid measures (define Pool_id to 0 if is null, filter partitions not authorized to report Pools usage by filtering PoolIdle value greater than 0), aggregate and report Pool Max CPU Usage per frameID for last 24 hours with auto span custom definition: (no limits in number of series, don't generate OTHER field)
div.pre: eventtype=nmon:performance type=LPAR frameID=$frameID$ hostname=$hostname$ PoolIdle>0 | eval Pool_usage=round((poolCPUs-PoolIdle),2) | eval Pool_id=if(isnull(Pool_id), "0", Pool_id) | where Pool_id=0 | bucket _time span=1m | stats max(Pool_usage) AS Pool_usage, max(poolCPUs) AS poolCPUs by _time,frameID | timechart useother=f limit=0 `nmon_span` max(Pool_usage) AS Pool_usage, max(poolCPUs) AS poolCPUs by frameID

div.h2: Compare yesterday Pool CPU Usage versus today usage: (auto span definition)
div.pre: eventtype=nmon:performance type=LPAR frameID=$frameID$ hostname=$hostname$ | eval Pool_usage=round((poolCPUs-PoolIdle),2) | timechart `nmon_span` max(Pool_usage) AS Pool_usage_yesterday | appendcols [ search eventtype=nmon:performance type=LPAR frameID=$frameID$ hostname=$hostname$ earliest="@d" latest="now" | Pool_usage=round((poolCPUs-PoolIdle),2) | timechart `nmon_span` max(Pool_usage) AS Pool_usage_today | fields - _time ]

div.h2: Gauge chart of average Pool CPU Percentage Usage over last 24 hours
div.pre: eventtype=nmon:performance type=LPAR frameID=$frameID$ hostname=$hostname$ | eval Pool_Pct_usage=round(((poolCPUs-PoolIdle)/poolCPUs*100),2) | stats avg(Pool_Pct_usage) AS Pool_Pct_usage | eval Pool_Pct_usage=round(Pool_Pct_usage,2)

div.h2: Gauge chart of average Pool CPU Usage in VP over last 24 hours with dynamic gauge values (Numbers of active CPUs in Pool)
div.pre: eventtype=nmon:performance type=LPAR frameID=$frameID$ hostname=$hostname$ | eval Pool_usage=round((poolCPUs-PoolIdle),2) | gauge avg(Pool_usage) AS Pool_usage [ search eventtype=nmon:performance type=LPAR frameID=$frameID$ hostname=$hostname$ | stats max(poolCPUs) AS max | eval first=0 | eval second=(max*0.50) | eval third=(max*0.75) | eval fourth=max | eval second=round(second,0) | eval third=round(third,0) | eval fourth=round(fourth,0) | eval range=first+" "+second+" "+third+" "+fourth | return $$range ]

div.h2: Column chart of TOP 10 average Pool CPU Percentage Usage over last 24 hours (filtering invalid Pool usage, aggregation per frameID,Pool_id
div.pre: eventtype=nmon:performance type=LPAR frameID=$frameID$ hostname=$hostname$ PoolIdle>0 | eval usage=round(((poolCPUs-PoolIdle)/poolCPUs*100),2) | eval Pool_id=if(isnull(Pool_id), "0", Pool_id) | bucket _time span=1m | stats max(usage) AS usage by frameID,Pool_id | stats avg(usage) AS value by frameID,Pool_id | sort - value | head 10 | eval s1="value" | makemv s1 | mvexpand s1 | eval yval=value | eval series="frame"+":"+frameID+":"+"Pool_id"+":"+Pool_id | eval "Pool % CPU usage"="TOP 10 Pool % Usage" | xyseries "Pool % CPU usage",series,yval

div.h2: Column chart of TOP 10 average Pool CPU Percentage Usage over last 30 days for Working hours Business days only (monday to friday, 08h to 19h, filtering invalid Pool usage, aggregation per frameID,Pool_id)
div.pre: eventtype=nmon:performance type=LPAR frameID=$frameID$ hostname=$hostname$ PoolIdle>0 | eval usage=round(((poolCPUs-PoolIdle)/poolCPUs*100),2) | eval Pool_id=if(isnull(Pool_id), "0", Pool_id) | eval date_wday=lower(strftime('_time', "%A")) | eval local_time=strftime('_time', "%H%M") | search (date_wday!="sunday" date_wday!="saturday") AND (local_time>="0800" AND local_time<="1900") | bucket _time span=1m | stats max(usage) AS usage by frameID,Pool_id | stats avg(usage) AS value by frameID,Pool_id | sort - value | head 10 | eval s1="value" | makemv s1 | mvexpand s1 | eval yval=value | eval series="frame"+":"+frameID+":"+"Pool_id"+":"+Pool_id | eval "Pool % CPU usage"="TOP 10 Pool % Usage" | xyseries "Pool % CPU usage",series,yval

div.h2: Column chart of TOP 10 average Pool CPU Percentage Usage over last 30 days for non Working hours Business days only (monday to friday, 19h to 08h, filtering invalid Pool usage, aggregation per frameID,Pool_id)
div.pre: eventtype=nmon:performance type=LPAR frameID=$frameID$ hostname=$hostname$ PoolIdle>0 | eval usage=round(((poolCPUs-PoolIdle)/poolCPUs*100),2) | eval Pool_id=if(isnull(Pool_id), "0", Pool_id) | eval date_wday=lower(strftime('_time', "%A")) | eval local_time=strftime('_time', "%H%M") | search (local_time>="1900" AND local_time<="2359") OR (local_time>="0000" AND local_time<="0800") AND (date_wday!="sunday" date_wday!="saturday") | bucket _time span=1m | stats max(usage) AS usage by frameID,Pool_id | stats avg(usage) AS value by frameID,Pool_id | sort - value | head 10 | eval s1="value" | makemv s1 | mvexpand s1 | eval yval=value | eval series="frame"+":"+frameID+":"+"Pool_id"+":"+Pool_id | eval "Pool % CPU usage"="TOP 10 Pool % Usage" | xyseries "Pool % CPU usage",series,yval

div.h2: Min / Average / Max CPU Pool Usage in Virtual Processors (filtering invalid Pool usage) over last 24 hours ordered and sorted by frame ID, Pool_id, hostname
div.pre: eventtype=nmon:performance type=LPAR frameID=$frameID$ hostname=$hostname$ PoolIdle>0 | eval usage=round((poolCPUs-PoolIdle),2) | eval Pool_id=if(isnull(Pool_id), "0", Pool_id) | stats min(usage) AS "Min Pool CPU usage", avg(usage) AS "Avg Pool CPU usage", max(usage) AS "Max Pool CPU usage" by frameID,Pool_id,hostname | eval "Avg Pool CPU usage"=round('Avg Pool CPU usage', 2) | sort frameID,Pool_id,hostname

div.h2: Min / Average / Max and Average sparkline of Pool CPU Usage in Virtual Processors (filtering invalid Pool usage) over last 24 hours ordered and sorted by frame ID, hostname
div.pre: eventtype=nmon:performance type=LPAR frameID=$frameID$ hostname=$hostname$ PoolIdle>0 | eval usage=round((poolCPUs-PoolIdle),2) | eval Pool_id=if(isnull(Pool_id), "0", Pool_id) | stats min(usage) AS "Min Pool CPU usage", avg(usage) AS "Avg Pool CPU usage", max(usage) AS "Max Pool CPU usage" sparkline(avg(usage)) As sparkline by frameID,Pool_id,hostname | eval "Avg Pool CPU usage"=round('Avg Pool CPU usage', 2) | sort frameID,Pool_id,hostname

div.h2: Min / Average / Max CPU Pool Usage in Percentage (filtering invalid Pool usage) over last 24 hours ordered and sorted by frame ID, Pool_id, hostname
div.pre: eventtype=nmon:performance type=LPAR frameID=$frameID$ hostname=$hostname$ PoolIdle>0 | eval usage=round(((poolCPUs-PoolIdle)/poolCPUs*100),2) | eval Pool_id=if(isnull(Pool_id), "0", Pool_id) | stats min(usage) AS "Min Pool CPU usage", avg(usage) AS "Avg Pool CPU usage", max(usage) AS "Max Pool CPU usage" by frameID,Pool_id,hostname | eval "Avg Pool CPU usage"=round('Avg Pool CPU usage', 2) | sort frameID,Pool_id,hostname

div.h2: Min / Average / Max and Average sparkline of Pool CPU Usage in Percentage (filtering invalid Pool usage) over last 24 hours ordered and sorted by frame ID, hostname
div.pre: eventtype=nmon:performance type=LPAR frameID=$frameID$ hostname=$hostname$ PoolIdle>0 | eval usage=round(((poolCPUs-PoolIdle)/poolCPUs*100),2) | eval Pool_id=if(isnull(Pool_id), "0", Pool_id) | stats min(usage) AS "Min Pool CPU usage", avg(usage) AS "Avg Pool CPU usage", max(usage) AS "Max Pool CPU usage" sparkline(avg(usage)) As sparkline by frameID,Pool_id,hostname | eval "Avg Pool CPU usage"=round('Avg Pool CPU usage', 2) | sort frameID,Pool_id,hostname

div.h2: Min / Average / Max of Pool CPU Usage in Percentage (filtering invalid Pool usage) over last 30 days for Business days only (monday to friday, 24hrs / 24hrs) ordered and sorted by frame ID, hostname
div.pre: eventtype=nmon:performance type=LPAR frameID=$frameID$ hostname=$hostname$ PoolIdle>0 | eval usage=round(((poolCPUs-PoolIdle)/poolCPUs*100),2) | eval Pool_id=if(isnull(Pool_id), "0", Pool_id) | eval date_wday=lower(strftime('_time', "%A")) | search (date_wday!="sunday" date_wday!="saturday") | stats min(usage) AS "Min Pool CPU usage", avg(usage) AS "Avg Pool CPU usage", max(usage) AS "Max Pool CPU usage" by frameID,Pool_id,hostname | eval "Avg Pool CPU usage"=round('Avg Pool CPU usage', 2) | sort frameID,Pool_id,hostname

div.h2: Min / Average / Max of Pool CPU Usage in Percentage (filtering invalid Pool usage) over last 30 days for Working hours Business days only (monday to friday, 08h to 19h) ordered and sorted by frame ID, hostname
div.pre: eventtype=nmon:performance type=LPAR frameID=$frameID$ hostname=$hostname$ PoolIdle>0 | eval usage=round(((poolCPUs-PoolIdle)/poolCPUs*100),2) | eval Pool_id=if(isnull(Pool_id), "0", Pool_id) | eval date_wday=lower(strftime('_time', "%A")) | eval local_time=strftime('_time', "%H%M") | search (date_wday!="sunday" date_wday!="saturday") AND (local_time>="0800" AND local_time<="1900") | stats min(usage) AS "Min Pool CPU usage", avg(usage) AS "Avg Pool CPU usage", max(usage) AS "Max Pool CPU usage" by frameID,Pool_id,hostname | eval "Avg Pool CPU usage"=round('Avg Pool CPU usage', 2) | sort frameID,Pool_id,hostname

div.h2: Min / Average / Max of Pool CPU Usage in Percentage (filtering invalid Pool usage) over last 30 days for non Working hours Business days only (monday to friday, 19h to 08h) ordered and sorted by frame ID, hostname
div.pre: eventtype=nmon:performance type=LPAR frameID=$frameID$ hostname=$hostname$ PoolIdle>0 | eval usage=round(((poolCPUs-PoolIdle)/poolCPUs*100),2) | eval Pool_id=if(isnull(Pool_id), "0", Pool_id) | eval date_wday=lower(strftime('_time', "%A")) | eval local_time=strftime('_time', "%H%M") | search (local_time>="1900" AND local_time<="2359") OR (local_time>="0000" AND local_time<="0800") AND (date_wday!="sunday" date_wday!="saturday") | stats min(usage) AS "Min Pool CPU usage", avg(usage) AS "Avg Pool CPU usage", max(usage) AS "Max Pool CPU usage" by frameID,Pool_id,hostname | eval "Avg Pool CPU usage"=round('Avg Pool CPU usage', 2) | sort frameID,Pool_id,hostname

div.h2: Compare Average Pool CPU Usage in Percentage (filtering invalid Pool usage) of previous month versus current month ordered and sorted by hostname
div.pre: eventtype=nmon:performance type=LPAR frameID=$frameID$ hostname=$hostname$ PoolIdle>0 earliest="-1mon@mon" latest="@mon" | eval usage=round(((poolCPUs-PoolIdle)/poolCPUs*100),2) | eval Pool_id=if(isnull(Pool_id), "0", Pool_id) | stats avg(usage) As usage_period1 by frameID,Pool_id,hostname | append [ search eventtype=nmon:performance type=LPAR frameID=$frameID$ hostname=$hostname$ PoolIdle>0 earliest="@mon" latest="now" | eval usage=round((poolCPUs-PoolIdle),2) | eval Pool_id=if(isnull(Pool_id), "0", Pool_id) | stats avg(usage) As usage_period2 by frameID,Pool_id,hostname ] | stats values(*) AS * by frameID,hostname | `eval_compare` | fields frameID,Pool_id,hostname,usage_period1,usage_period2,Delta_usage,"Evolution_usage (%)",range

div.h2: Use transaction to find Pools having an average CPU usage higher than 90% for a minimal contiguous period of 5 minutes and report by frameID,Pool_id
div.pre: eventtype=nmon:performance type=LPAR frameID=$frameID$ hostname=$hostname$ PoolIdle>0 | eval Pool_usage=round((poolCPUs-PoolIdle),2) | eval Pool_Pct_usage=round(((poolCPUs-PoolIdle)/poolCPUs*100),2) | eval Pool_id=if(isnull(Pool_id), "0", Pool_id) | where Pool_Pct_usage>90 | transaction frameID Pool_id Pool_Pct_usage maxpause=5m | where duration>300 | fields _time,frameID,Pool_id,hostname,duration,Pool_Pct_usage,Pool_usage,poolCPUs | stats values(*) AS * by _time,hostname | dedup _time,frameID | eval "duration (hh:mm:ss)"=tostring(duration,"duration") | rename duration AS "duration (seconds)" | fields _time,frameID,hostname,duration*,Pool_Pct_usage,Pool_usage,poolCPUs

div.h2: Use transaction to find Pools having an average CPU usage higher than 90% for a minimal contiguous period of 5 minutes restricted to Open hours and Business days (monday to friday, 08h to 19h) and report by frameID,Pool_id
div.pre: eventtype=nmon:performance type=LPAR frameID=$frameID$ hostname=$hostname$ PoolIdle>0 | eval Pool_usage=round((poolCPUs-PoolIdle),2) | eval Pool_Pct_usage=round(((poolCPUs-PoolIdle)/poolCPUs*100),2) | eval Pool_id=if(isnull(Pool_id), "0", Pool_id) | eval date_wday=lower(strftime('_time', "%A")) | eval local_time=strftime('_time', "%H%M") | search (date_wday!="sunday" date_wday!="saturday") AND (local_time>="0800" AND local_time<="1900") | where Pool_Pct_usage>90 | transaction frameID Pool_id Pool_Pct_usage maxpause=5m | where duration>300 | fields _time,frameID,Pool_id,hostname,duration,Pool_Pct_usage,Pool_usage,poolCPUs | stats values(*) AS * by _time,hostname | dedup _time,frameID | eval "duration (hh:mm:ss)"=tostring(duration,"duration") | rename duration AS "duration (seconds)" | fields _time,frameID,hostname,duration*,Pool_Pct_usage,Pool_usage,poolCPUs
